post_text: Nottoway County Public Schools names new Division Superintendent. Dr. Tameshia V. Grimes was appointed at the Special Called School Board meeting tonight, Friday, June 28, 2019. Superintendent Search

The Nottoway County School Board announced today that it will take the next step in the process of hiring a new superintendent by seeking public input on qualifications.

The school board has created a survey related to superintendent criteria, which is available at https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NottowayCountySearch and on the home page of the division website. Hard copies of the survey will also be available at the school board administration offices and at each school. The deadline to complete the survey is April 18th.

‚ÄúHiring a new superintendent is an important task for the school board and we encourage that the public participate in the process of determining qualifications for our next superintendent,‚Äù said School Board Chair Jacqueline Gray-Hawkes, ‚ÄúWe hope that all community members will take time to fill out the online survey.‚Äù

The school board selected the Virginia School Boards Association (VSBA) to assist the board with the superintendent search.

Nottoway Middle School offers several fall sports opportunities for student-athletes entering 6th, 7th, and 8th grades.

Current physicals are required in order to tryout and practice. Physicals must have been completed on or after May 1st, 2018. Last year's physicals are no longer valid.

NMS football practice will begin Monday, July 30th. Practice will be held Monday through Thursday from 3:30 to 6:30 the first week. Athletes will need to bring workout clothes, cleats and tennis shoes, and lots of water to drink.

NMS cheerleading tryouts will begin on Monday, August 13th immediately after school. Coach Smith will meet with prospective cheerleaders on Thursday, August 9th immediately after school to hand out more information.

NMS volleyball tryouts will begin on Monday, August 13th immediately after school. Coach Brown will be handing out more information the first week of school.

If you have any questions, please contact the NMS Athletic Director Lloyd Page at Page.lloyd@Nottowayschools.org.

Current physicals are required in order to tryout and practice. Physicals must have been completed on or after May 1st, 2018. Last year's physicals are no longer valid.

NMS football practice will begin Monday, July 30th. Practice will be held Monday through Thursday from 3:30 to 6:30 the first week. Athletes will need to bring workout clothes, cleats and tennis shoes, and lots of water to drink.

NMS cheerleading tryouts will begin on Monday, August 13th immediately after school. Coach Smith will meet with prospective cheerleaders on Thursday, August 9th immediately after school to hand out more information.

NMS volleyball tryouts will begin on Monday, August 13th immediately after school. Coach Brown will be handing out more information the first week of school.

If you have any questions, please contact the NMS Athletic Director Lloyd Page at Page.lloyd@Nottowayschools.org.
